originalText.text: I first went to this church in Harlem when I lived in Harlem as a young girl. We left the neighborhood in 1965 but I sang there with a gospel group that we had from music and art which is now called fiorello. And then years later relocated to the Bronx. Recently an old friend passed away and the service was at the church which is now a new church built sometime recently in the past. It has a new pastor who is Young and vibrant. The community as a whole is not the same as it used to be but the atmosphere at St Luke's Baptist led me to become a member again. I love my church! I have been attending since May and I can see me staying there for the rest of my days. They are Community minded and serving the needs of the members of the church and the visitors as well. I'm a senior now so there are times that I might not feel well or be unable to attend physically. They are live stream on Sundays so people all around the country are able to attend services and become a part of the wonderful praise and worship that goes on at St Luke's Baptist Church. This video was taken on the day that the church celebrated its original pastor JG McCann passed away a couple of years ago. It is wonderful that this church holds history close and shares it with the community. It is also special that you feel like you are part of the family when attending services at St Luke's Baptist

originalText.text: I have to say it is a great church.  They are very welcoming to any new visitors.  The music is AMAZING! I am not saying that because I know someone that plays in the band.  It is really great music, they have a full live band with a horn section and incredible singers.  Pastor McCann can really preach and he always has great practical messages for his sermons.  I highly recommend going to visit this church.  I have been on Easter Sunday where everyone wears white, and have also been to their Wednesday service too.

originalText.text: It Change my Life when the Lord Blesses me with this Big manifestion Im going to Sow a Big Seed Into this Church ...In Jesus Name..Amen...I'm currently in a shelter but still try to keep my head up they make me feel wanted even if I'm not dress in fancy clothes they accept you as is always you are always welcome in Saint Luke . The Pastor John G. McCann is the Best . I truly Love him as a Pastor .. As the Pastor always says with God It's Possible

originalText.text: At that church. You not only hear preaching. You get teaching.  We're Dr. Shan.Hillard is the pastor.

originalText.text: This is a very nice temple to come worship. If you need a church house look no further, St Luke's is the place to be to praise the lord. Amen
